descriptionHtml:
[size=4][center][color=red]This Mod Requires:[/color][/center][/size]
[size=4][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37660/?]Stranger Danger - Children can be pick-pocketed or killed[/url] [color=green]by mrjentipede,[/color] & [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48566/?]Children can wear all[/url] [color=green]by oldcyder.[/color][/center][/size]
--
[size=3][color=#DB7900][center]Created by: Alivante[/center][/color][/size]
[size=12][color=#DB7900][center]Children of Skyrim! (Followers)[/center][/color][/size]
[size=4][center][color=green]This Mod affects the listed below (Turns Into Children)...[/color][/center][/size]
--
"Uthgerd the Unbroken is a Nord Warrior and potential follower located in the city of Whiterun inside the Bannered Mare. Her house is located in Whiterun across from Carlotta Valentia's house."

"Benor is a Nord who lives in Morthal. He applied for guard duty once, but for unknown reasons he hasn't been accepted. He now helps the guard in any way he can."

"Cosnach is a Breton who lives in the Warrens of Markarth."
--
[color=#DB7900]You can also marry any of the three![/color]
[size=4][center][color=red]This Mod Requires:[/color][/center][/size]
[size=4][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37660/?]Stranger Danger - Children can be pick-pocketed or killed[/url] [color=green]by mrjentipede,[/color] & [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48566/?]Children can wear all[/url] [color=green]by oldcyder.[/color][/center][/size]
--
This is my first Mod, please enjoy.
author: Alivante
